body.p:
Frankfort Ky Mar 25th 1861
Hon. B. Magoffin
DeaSir

Allow me to call your attention to the accompaning letter addressed to me by Mrs Mary S Robertson a most estimable and highly reputable lady. indeed I know now more so as requested by her I called to see the girle Bridget McMahan. and found She had been Sentenced to one year had been in one year. I am Satisfied from all I can leave that no public or private fault can be promoted by continuing her longer in confinement I thefore Unite with Mrs Robertson in soliciting her Pardon. to take effet as an early a day as maybe.

Issue pardon
B. M
Kenton Cir. Ct
McMahan Bridget
Stealing goods one year Kenton June Term 1860 time Expires July 9th 1861
One yr. Penty
Issd Mar 27. 1861
